title: Burning
description: The target character and any character within Melee range of the target when this property is activated, gains the Burning 3 effect for 3 rounds.

title: Claws
description: This creature may make two claw attacks per turn against one or more opponents at Melee range.

title: Flyer
description: This creature can fly. It ignores all penalties for rough terrain and gets a free Move Maneuver per turn. It must make a Move Maneuver every turn or stall. It ignores up to 2 Risk when disengaging from a non-flying opponent.

title: Maul
description: After a successful claw attack the GM may invoke the Fates to Pin the target character in addition to inflicting the attack damage. Successes on the attack roll are used as both additional damage for the Harm Action and for the Pin penalty applied to the target.

title: Venomous
description: Any character who suffers a successful Bite Action when this property is activated, whether or not they gain Risk or suffer a Wound, gains Poison 2.
